docs.lead_paragraph: Information was yesterday sent to the Police Head-quarters that a person sick of yellow fever ha?? been moved from on board the ship Rattler, lying a Pier No. 8 North River. This information was tele graphed to Mayor TIEMANN, at Manhattanville, who immediately came to the City to inquire into the case, and to take such steps as would protect the health of the City.
